World.headline: Poll Bonds Scrapped by SC, Trusts Now Primary Funding Source for BJP
World.summary: The Supreme Court's decision to scrap electoral bonds has dramatically shifted political funding dynamics in India. Data for 2024-25 shows that a staggering 84% of the BJP's funds are now channeled through trusts, raising significant concerns about transparency and accountability in political donations.
key_points: Supreme Court abolished electoral bonds.
BJP received 84% of its 2024-25 funds from trusts.

World.headline: Mahayuti Sweeps Maharashtra Local Body Polls, MVA Restricted to 44 Posts
World.summary: The ruling Mahayuti alliance has secured a decisive victory in the Maharashtra local body elections, capturing 207 posts. World.summary: India has suspended its visa operations in Chittagong, Bangladesh, signaling escalating diplomatic tensions between the two nations. Provides insights into viral transmission pathways.

Health.headline: New Study Suggests Full-Fat Cheese Might Protect Brain Health
Health.summary: A new study suggests that consuming full-fat cheese might offer protective benefits for brain health, challenging some conventional dietary advice. This research opens avenues for further investigation into the complex relationship between dairy, diet, and neurological well-being.
key_points: Study suggests full-fat cheese may protect brain health.
Challenges conventional dietary advice.
Calls for further research on dairy and neurological health.

Health.headline: Air Pollution Keeping Children Indoors in Bosnian Capital Amid Crisis
Health.summary: Severe air pollution in the Bosnian capital is forcing children indoors, creating a public health crisis and affecting their daily lives. The alarming levels of particulate matter highlight an urgent environmental and health challenge facing the city's vulnerable population.
key_points: Air pollution is forcing children indoors in Bosnian capital.
Created a public health crisis.
Highlights urgent environmental challenge.
